short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use the latest AI models on any article, video or document: summarize, extract key points, translate, generate quizes, and more

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Do you want a short and concise version of a long article you're about to read or video you're about to watch? If yes, this is the extension to use!

What it does:
💬 Chat: ask anything about the content
🍰 Summarize: shorten long content into a short paragraph or bullet points
🇪🇸 Translate: ask to translate in any language you want, even klingon!
🕵️ Works on: any article, any website, PDF files, images, audio files, YouTube videos
🗃️ Saves all links in the Hono app, so you can find them later
🆓 No account or api keys required
🙈 Private: unlike other extensions, this extension does not request access to all your browsing history

Change log:
- v1.11: UI updates & message streaming
- v1.10: Persist chat messages between extension usage
- v1.9: Bug fixes & performance improvements
- v1.8: Improvements for Chat interface
- v1.7: "Ask" tab, to have a chat with the content of the page
